001package com.example.geometry;
002
003/**
004 * An immutable circle defined by a radius in linear units.
005 *
006 * <p>Instances validate the radius at construction time to maintain
007 * class invariants.</p>
008 *
009 * @author ChatGPT
010 * @since 1.0
011 */
012public final class Circle implements Shape {
013    private final double radius;
014
015    /**
016     * Creates a circle with the given radius.
017     *
018     * @param radius the radius (must be {@code >= 0})
019     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code radius < 0}
020     */
021    public Circle(double radius) {
022        if (radius < 0) {
023            throw new IllegalArgumentException("radius must be >= 0");
024        }
025        this.radius = radius;
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * Returns the radius of this circle.
030     *
031     * @return the radius (non-negative)
032     */
033    public double radius() {
034        return radius;
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public double area() {
039        return Math.PI * radius * radius;
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public double perimeter() {
044        return 2 * Math.PI * radius;
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public String describe() {
049        return "Circle[r=" + radius + "]";
050    }
051}
